Name: Absinthe Suisesse
Ingredients: 30 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Absinthe smoothed with cream and sweet almond.
Nutrition: One serving of Absinthe Suisesse contains 298 calories
